patterns: how many department are available in your college
responses: There are total six deparments in our college including Computer , Mechanical, Civil , E & TC , AIDS , MBA etc.

Vision of Our college is Transform young aspirant learners towards creativity and professionalism for societal growth through quality technical education.  and Mission is To share values, ideas, beliefs by encouraging faculties and students for welfare of society.
